sourcesContent:
export default function HostelCard({ hostel }) { const avgRating = hostel.reviews?.length > 0 ? ( hostel.reviews.reduce((sum, r) => sum + r.rating, 0) / hostel.reviews.length ).toFixed(1) : "N/A"; return (

{hostel.name}

star {avgRating}

{hostel.area}

For {hostel.gender} {hostel.profession}s

PKR {hostel.rent.toLocaleString()}/month

); }
